title: Question 5:
description: How can I unlock/vest my escrowed tokens from the HAV token sale?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: If your SNX is still escrowed from the Havven token sale â€” they can be vested through Mintr in the ESCROW tab by clicking on the 'View Token Sale Escrow' button.
